name: Solar (thevinter)
description:
Solar is a game where you control a cute fire spawn and try to reach a the end of a dungeon without getting extinguished! 

Sadly our artist left us at the last day with zero art so we had to rush everything by ourselves. The final game was supposed to have more features, but even right now it's in a playable state. 

When I published the game it was 3am and I went to sleep. Since the first impression is almost everything and you want to play the game, please wait until tomorrow so I fix all the gamebreaking bugs :)

Code: thevinter
Music: IainWay
Art: thevinter, IainWay
